titles.title: A bill to establish a pilot program for police departments to use anonymous texts from citizens to augment their anonymous tip hotlines.
Text a Tip Act of 2007
Text a Tip Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Text a Tip Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Attorney General to make grants to state or local police departments to implement an anonymous tip program using cell phone text messaging to assist police in preventing and solving crimes.
